title: Skagboys
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: I never thought it would work out like this. I'm quivering myself, as ah escort a lifeless Maria and Elaine intae Deacon Brodie's Tavern on the Royal Mile. The pub is like an annexe ay the court a couple ay doors along, full ay criminals and the odd barrister, and mair than a few tourists wondering how they've stumbled intae this weirdness.
